faq.title: Frequently Asked <colored>Questions</colored>
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our platform. Can't find the answer you're looking for? Feel free to contact us.
faq.contact_prompt: Our team is here to help you get started.

items.question: How quickly can I get started?
items.answer: You can start building your gamification program immediately after signing up. Our intuitive dashboard and pre-built templates mean you can launch your first campaign in under 30 minutes.

items.question: Do you offer custom integrations?
items.answer: Yes! We provide a comprehensive REST API, webhooks, and SDKs for popular platforms. Our team can also help with custom integrations for Enterprise plans.

items.question: What kind of support do you provide?
items.answer: All plans include email support. Standard and Pro plans get priority support, while Enterprise customers receive dedicated account management and 24/7 phone support.

items.question: Can I customize the look and feel?
items.answer: Absolutely! Our platform offers extensive customization options including colors, logos, fonts, and layouts. Pro and Enterprise plans include white-label options.

items.question: Is there a free trial?
items.answer: Yes, all paid plans come with a 14-day free trial. No credit card required to start. You can explore all features and see if it's the right fit for your business.

items.question: How does pricing scale with users?
items.answer: Each plan includes a specific number of active users. As your business grows, you can upgrade to a higher tier or contact us for custom Enterprise pricing with unlimited users.

items.question: What analytics and reporting do you provide?
items.answer: Our platform includes real-time analytics, custom reports, user engagement metrics, campaign performance tracking, and ROI analysis. Export data in CSV or connect via our API.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Security is our top priority. We use enterprise-grade encryption, regular security audits, GDPR compliance, and offer SOC 2 certification for Enterprise customers.
